content.field:
• Multi-tenant Saas portal to translate content in cloud systems
  • Plugin architecture with the ability to build additional custom plugins.
  • API to persist context submitted from the adaptor 
  • Ability to add a edit button inside each integration which opens our bi-lingual + preview page
  • Simple Business reports without Tableau
  • Scope approval  - review analysis report of job without starting  
  • Translation status / health of a particular campaign
  • Reports to see how much content is translated, what is in progress and what yet needs to be submitted.

 

WYSIWYG translation editor

  • Static HTML DOM will be captured using a proxy or a plugin
  • References to CSS, JS and images will be swapped out to files on the PREVIEW server
  • At the time of preview, API will get the static HTML and translated segments JSON as input.
    • Parse static DOM using AP.
    • Seed translated DIV within that DOM with a highlighted background.
    • On click of div, open the div for editing using Create.js. A right panel can show source and target text for more context.
    • Save edited DIV in JSON and submit the updated JSON to TM and Connector
